UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Systematic peptide engineering and structural characterization to search for the shortest antimicrobial peptide analogue of gaegurin 5
Literature.Author: Won HS, Jung SJ, Kim HE, Seo MD, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>200µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>200µg/ml)
